title: MGM Group of Institutions
text: MGM Group of Institutions are a group of educational institutions set up by <a href="Kamalkishor%20Kadam">Kamalkishor Kadam</a>, the former Education Minister of the Indian state of <a href="Maharashtra">Maharashtra</a>. The group includes several engineering colleges and a medical college in <a href="Aurangabad%2C%20Maharashtra">Aurangabad</a>, <a href="Nanded">Nanded</a>, and <a href="Noida">Noida</a>.
